name: Guided Forecast
text: Announce a stock and a direction. At the start of your next turn, move that stock in that direction by five.

name: Guided Forecast
text: Announce a stock and a direction. At the start of your next turn, move that stock in that direction by five.

name: Supply Dump / Corner the Market
text: You may trade in as many of a stock as you choose. Raise or lower the price of that stock by the amount you traded in.

name: Supply Dump / Corner the Market
text: You may trade in as many of a stock as you choose. Raise or lower the price of that stock by the amount you traded in.

name: Portfolio Rebalance
text: Choose one: move the stock you own the most of down five, or move the stock you own the least of up five. If there are ties, choose which stock to move.

name: Portfolio Rebalance
text: Choose one: move the stock you own the most of down five, or move the stock you own the least of up five. If there are ties, choose which stock to move.

name: Market Crash
text: Move the price of all stocks down by two.

name: Market Boom
text: Move the price of all stocks up by two.

name: Block Trade
text: Buy or sell up to five of any one stock

name: Asset Conversion
text: Exchange two of a stock for one of any other stock. Repeat as many times as you want with those stock types.

name: Asset Conversion
text: Exchange two of a stock for one of any other stock. Repeat as many times as you want with those stock types.

name: Liquidate Holdings
text: You may sell any number of an action type in your hand for the price of the stock. You may do it for only one stock type.

name: Premium Purchase
text: Buy as many as you want of any one stock. You must pay the current price + $3.

name: Premium Purchase
text: Buy as many as you want of any one stock. You must pay the current price + $3.

name: Strategic Selection
text: Look at the top three cards of any one action type and draw one. Put the other two at the bottom of the deck.

name: Strategic Selection
text: Look at the top three cards of any one action type and draw one. Put the other two at the bottom of the deck.

name: Market Crash
text: Move the price of all stocks down by two.

name: Market Boom
text: Move the price of all stocks up by two.

name: Sell it for scraps
text: Sell as many of one type of stock as you want for the current price - $3.

name: System Reset
text: Set your remaining moves to two.

name: System Reset
text: Set your remaining moves to two.

name: System Reset
text: Set your remaining moves to two.

name: System Reset
text: Set your remaining moves to two.

name: Action Replication
text: This action behaves as a copy of the last action you played. It doesn't count against your move limit, and you can play it even if you have zero moves left.

name: Action Replication

name: Action Replication

name: Deferred Overclock
text: Lose all your moves this turn. Next turn you start with six moves. Play only as the first move of a turn.

name: Deferred Overclock
text: Lose all your moves this turn. Next turn you start with six moves. Play only as the first move of a turn.

name: Dual Execution
text: Play the top action of price persuaders or liquidity lovers. Repeat this three total times.

name: Dual Execution
text: Play the top action of price persuaders or liquidity lovers. Repeat this three total times.

name: Dual Execution
text: Play the top action of price persuaders or liquidity lovers. Repeat this three total times.

name: Shopping frenzy
text: Get up to three adctions of types other than Technology Tycoons.

name: Market Crash
text: Move the price of all stocks down by two.

name: Market Boom
text: Move the price of all stocks up by two.

name: Forced Liquidation
text: Move the price of a stock down two. Choose an opponent that possesses that stock. They must sell all of their stock of that type.

name: Forced Liquidation
text: Move the price of a stock down two. Choose an opponent that possesses that stock. They must sell all of their stock of that type.

name: Forced Liquidation
text: Move the price of a stock down two. Choose an opponent that possesses that stock. They must sell all of their stock of that type.

name: Market Trap
text: Move the price of a stock up two. Choose an opponent that possesses that stock. They must buy as many of that stocks as they can afford up to three.

name: Market Trap
text: Move the price of a stock up two. Choose an opponent that possesses that stock. They must buy as many of that stocks as they can afford up to three.

name: Market Trap
text: Move the price of a stock up two. Choose an opponent that possesses that stock. They must buy as many of that stocks as they can afford up to three.

name: Regulatory Shutdown
text: Play in response to an opponent's action card to cancel its effect.

name: Regulatory Shutdown
text: Play in response to an opponent's action card to cancel its effect.

name: Embezzlement
text: Steal $10 from an opponent.

name: Embezzlement
text: Steal $10 from an opponent.

name: Embezzlement

name: Hostile Exchange
text: You may exchange two stock of one type for an opponent's as many times as you want. Do this for only one stock type.

name: Hostile Exchange
text: You may exchange two stock of one type for an opponent's as many times as you want. Do this for only one stock type.

name: Pump and Dump
text: Choose an opponent and a stock. They must buy as many of your stock of that type from you as they can afford.

name: Intercept Operation
text: Play after an opponent plays an action to take the action card for yourself. The card still resolves for your opponent as normal.

name: Intercept Operation
text: Play after an opponent plays an action to take the action card for yourself. The card still resolves for your opponent as normal.

name: Intercept Operation
text: Play after an opponent plays an action to take the action card for yourself. The card still resolves for your opponent as normal.

name: Market Crash
text: Move the price of all stocks down by two.

name: Market Boom
text: Move the price of all stocks up by two.

name: Hostile takeover
text: Buy as many of one type of stock from an opponent as you want. Pay them the price of the stock -$3.

name: Market Crash
text: Move the price of all stocks down by two.

name: Market Boom
text: Move the price of all stocks up by two.

name: Government Grant
text: Gain $5 from the bank.

name: Stimulus Package
text: The poorest player (in terms of cash) gains $10

name: Death of a rich aunt
text: The player with the fewest stocks gets a free stock in Price Persuasion.

name: Orderly Sell-Off
text: Starting with you and going left, every player can sell up to three of their stocks.

name: Buying Frenzy
text: Starting with you and going left, every player can buy up to three stocks.

name: Seed Capital
text: Start with an extra $5

name: Early Advantage
text: Once per game you may start your turn with five moves.

name: Strategic Planning
text: At the start of the game draw an action of your choice for free.

name: Universal Exposure
text: You can play card that references a specific stock (e.g., increase the price of Price Persuasion by three) on any stock.

name: Black Market Premium
text: Sell Corporate Espionage Stock at the asking price plus one tick.
